entities.name: yule ball
entities.description: The Yule Ball is mentioned as an event where Harry and Ron attended. It is described as a social gathering where students from Hogwarts and Durmstrang interacted.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the main character who attended the Yule Ball. He was happy to go to bed after the event, indicating that he did not enjoy it.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as Harry's friend who attended the Yule Ball. He seemed bad-tempered and continued to climb the stairs after Cedric spoke to Harry.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned as a student who said goodnight to Krum before going up the staircase. She gave Ron a cold look and did not speak to him.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is mentioned as a Durmstrang student who was saying goodnight to Hermione before going back to his ship.

entities.name: durmstrang ship
entities.description: The Durmstrang ship is mentioned as the vessel that Krum returned to after saying goodnight to Hermione.

entities.name: cedric diggory
entities.description: Cedric Diggory is mentioned as a student who called out to Harry on the staircase. He seemed hesitant to speak in front of Ron and lowered his voice when speaking to Harry.

entities.name: cho chang
entities.description: Cho Chang is mentioned as a student who was waiting for Harry in the entrance hall below. She is not described further in this passage.

entities.name: golden egg
entities.description: The golden egg is mentioned as an object that Cedric asked Harry about. It seems to be related to a task or challenge that the students are working on.

relationships.description: Harry Potter attended the Yule Ball, as mentioned in the passage. He was happy to go to bed after the event.
Ron Weasley also attended the Yule Ball, as mentioned in the passage. He seemed bad-tempered and continued to climb the stairs after Cedric spoke to Harry.
Hermione Granger said goodnight to Krum before going up the staircase, as mentioned in the passage.
Cedric Diggory spoke to Harry on the staircase, as mentioned in the passage. He seemed hesitant to speak in front of Ron and lowered his voice when speaking to Harry.
Cedric Diggory asked Harry about the golden egg, as mentioned in the passage. It seems to be related to a task or challenge that the students are working on.
